name: papermerge
description: Papermerge is a document management system designed to scan, classify, and OCR documents, storing them in a searchable, organized structure with tagging and export support.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Automatic optical character recognition converts scanned documents and images into searchable, selectable text

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Organize documents into folders and categories with hierarchical structure for logical filing

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Apply multiple tags to documents for flexible categorization and cross-referencing across different schemes

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Download documents individually or in bulk with original formatting preserved for external use or backup

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Control document access with user-level permissions to secure sensitive information in multi-user environments
